readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.13/f Haley 1500/z winter/t 1000 1600: desolate/35 11/farmer 35 3 2 Haley 35 11 2/speed Haley 4/skippable/move Haley -2 0 3/pause 300/faceDirection Haley 2/move Haley 4 0 1/pause 300/faceDirection Haley 0/move Haley -2 0 2/emote Haley 28/move farmer 0 5 2/faceDirection Haley 0/emote Haley 16/speak Haley "@！快來！$s"/move farmer 0 2 2/speak Haley "我的手鐲不見了！我來這裡的時候還戴著的……$s#$b#但現在消失了，找來找去都找不到……$s"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 8/speak Haley "$q 48 null#這東西現在已經買不到了……$s#$r 48 -30 Event_beach1#別擔心，我給你買個新的！ #$r 48 50 Event_beach2#太遺憾了……"/faceDirection Haley 2/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 600/showFrame Haley 22/pause 500/speak Haley "對不起，曾祖母。我弄丟了你珍貴的手鐲。請原諒我。$s"/playMusic ocean/pause 1000/message "會不會是掉在附近了？"/playerControl haleyBeach/globalFade .015/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 36 11/faceDirection farmer 3/positionOffset farmer 0 16/faceDirection Haley 1/pause 500/viewport 35 11 true/pause 800/playMusic sadpiano/speak Haley "那個是……？$8"/emote Haley 16/jump Haley/pause 600/speak Haley "你找到了！$h"/showFrame Haley 23/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 1/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 1/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 1/pause 50/eyes 5 -5000/positionOffset Haley 2 1/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Haley 2 0/pause 50/speak Haley "太感謝你了。 @。你真是我的恩人。"/eyes 1 -5000/pause 3000/speak Haley "我不會忘記你的幫忙的。$l"/end dialogue Haley "我欠你一次人情, @。"
content.20/f Alex 500/z winter/p Alex/w sunny: playful/-100 -100/farmer 27 7 2 Alex 25 17 2/showFrame Alex 23/skippable/animate Alex false true 125 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23/viewport 28 14 true/move farmer 0 10 2/stopAnimation Alex/showFrame Alex 24/pause 600/showFrame Alex 23/speak Alex "嗨。"/pause 300/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "呃，你是 @，對吧？"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Alex "我只是在享受這天氣， @。"/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 500/showFrame Alex 24/speak Alex "嗯……$u#$b#喂，要試玩一下不！$h"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 3/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 4/animate Alex false false 80 24 25 25 26 4/pause 240/playSound throw/animate farmer true true 100 30/specificTemporarySprite joshFootball/null/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 700/speak Alex "呵……接得漂亮。"/pause 500/move farmer -2 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection Alex 2/speak Alex "我將會成為星露谷的第一位專業格球選手……我毫不懷疑。#$b#我已經率領校隊打入了區域季後賽……現在我只需一直訓練加強自己以便獲得加入祖祖城隧道隊主力隊的機會。你等著瞧吧！"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#我相信你！#哇，你真夠自大的。"/fork arrogantJosh/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 500/speak Alex "非常感謝， @。我會記住的。"/move Alex 1 0 1/pause 500/end dialogue Alex "嘿，爽不爽啊？"
content.arrogantJosh: pause 500/faceDirection Alex 3/emote Alex 12/faceDirection Alex 2/speak Alex "嗯……有人嫉妒了。$a"/move Alex 0 -15 0 true/speak Alex "我先走了。$a"/faceDirection farmer 0/end dialogue Alex "……$a"
content.288847/f Alex 2000/p Alex/w sunny: ocean/-100 -100/farmer 52 13 2 Alex 53 24 2/showFrame Alex 38/skippable/viewport 53 24 true/pause 2000/speak Alex "*吸氣*……$s"/move farmer 0 11 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 36/pause 500/showFrame Alex 37/pause 500/speak Alex "哦…… @。被你看見我流淚了。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Alex 36/pause 1000/showFrame 95/pause 2000/speak Alex "十二年前的今天……我母親離開了人間。$9"/pause 1000/speak Alex "我很想念她……她經常做醃蘿蔔三明治給我們當午餐……經常跟我在後院玩格球。$9#$b#她把我照顧得很好……年輕時不懂得如何說“謝謝”。現在卻子欲養而親不待。$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 38/pause 1000/speak Alex "這是我保存下來的唯一信物…………她的秘密音樂盒。$s"/pause 1000/playSound openBox/showFrame Alex 35/pause 500/playMusic tinymusicbox/pause 10000/specificTemporarySprite JoshMom/pause 20000/playMusic ocean/pause 900/showFrame Alex 37/pause 900/showFrame Alex 36/pause 800/speak Alex "$q -1 null#那麼……你現在在想什麼，@?$9#$r -1 0 event_box1#活出精彩人生以報答你母親養育之恩。#$r -1 0 event_box2#你不應該沉浸在過去不放手。#$r -1 0 event_box3#要是你寂寞了，我永遠會陪伴你。#$r -1 0 event_box4#咬咬牙撐過去。人生不易，且行且珍惜。"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 36/pause 1000/speak Alex "待在這裡發呆也不算事……咱們回鎮子去吧。$9"/showFrame Alex 0/stopAnimation farmer/move Alex 0 -2 0 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 false/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 800/speak Alex "呃…… @?$9"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Alex "別告訴任何人我哭了，好嗎？$7"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 100/jump Alex/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/emote Alex 16/speak Alex "嘿！$7"/move Alex 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.29/f Sebastian 2000/t 1200 2300/w rainy: rain/12 38/farmer 12 29 2 Sebastian 12 39 2/skippable/move farmer 0 7 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 400/speak Sebastian "@?"/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/speak Sebastian "嘿，沒想到會在雨中遇見你。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "你看天邊那些烏雲……"/pause 2000/speak Sebastian "希望是奔我們而來的。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "我喜歡這種天氣，所有人都消失不見……#$b#因為人一多我就感到緊張。$s"/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 400/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 400/speak Sebastian "不過跟你在一起我沒有緊張的感覺。$7"/pause 2000/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "我們都成落湯雞了……"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 39/animate Sebastian false false 300 37 38 39/pause 300/playSound cast/pause 280/specificTemporarySprite umbrella/pause 800/speak Sebastian "來……這裡有足夠兩人的位置。$7"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/animate farmer true true 100 6 7/playSound dwop/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3500/end
content.43/f Elliott 2500/w sunny/t 700 1300: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 16 2 Elliott 13 27 1/specificTemporarySprite elliottBoat/skippable/viewport 17 26 true/move farmer 0 8 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Elliott "嘿，"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Elliott 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "話說……我修好了我屋子旁邊那艘舊划艇。厲害吧？"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "@……不知道你是否願意加入它的首航？$l"/faceDirection farmer 2/question fork1 "是否登上划艇？#是#不是"/fork NoToElliott/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ElliottSea/playSound wateringCan/pause 1000/playSound wateringCan/playMusic 50s/warp farmer 26 20/positionOffset farmer 0 8/warp Elliott 26 20/showFrame Elliott 25/positionOffset Elliott 0 60/viewport 25 20 true/pause 5000/speak Elliott "我出的書上市一陣子了……雖然銷量不算好，但是卻獲得了專家們的好評。#$b#要不是你的支持和鼓勵，我肯定無法完成我的書。$l"/pause 1000/speak Elliott "其實，我是在開玩笑的。就算沒有你我自己也能完成這本書。$h#$b#不過我很感激你信任我……和我的夢想。還有，那個……"/pause 500/speak Elliott "呃…… @?該怎麼說呢……$8"/emote Elliott 40/speak Elliott "我們成為朋友一陣子了……但是我……我不確定自己是否還當你是朋友。$l"/emote farmer 16/speak Elliott "不是！我不是想要跟你斷絕關係的意思！$8#$b#事實上……恰恰相反。$l"/pause 1000/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "讓我想想，我該怎麼說才對……？$l#$b#暈，我竟然什麼都說不出口了……"/playMusic elliottPiano/pause 2500/showFrame Elliott 35/screenFlash 1/warp Elliott 26 20/positionOffset Elliott 24 8/positionOffset farmer -20 16/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 101/specificTemporarySprite heart 26 20/playSound dwop/pause 1500/startJittering/pause 700/speak Elliott "$q -1 null#@?你在顫抖……$l#$r -1 50 event_boat1#我很開心。#$r -1 -50 event_boat2#你讓我整個人都不好了。別這樣。"/stopJittering/fork tooBold/pause 1800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Elliott "我們還是趁颳起南風前回去吧。$l^啊……你剛才的顫抖引來了緋紅魚的注意……我們得馬上離開了。$l"/pause 1400/speak Elliott "從這裡遠眺山谷……終於有一種“家”的感覺了。"/pause 4000/speak Elliott "*唉*……真是累人的一天……$l"/end
content.NoToElliott: emote Elliott 16/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 1/showFrame Elliott 31/pause 1000/emote Elliott 28/pause 600/speak Elliott "明白了。$7"/move farmer 0 -10 0 true/pause 800/end dialogue Elliott "……$a"
content.733330/f Sam 750/w sunny/t 700 1500/z wi: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 40 9 2 Sam 41 18 2 Vincent 43 22 2/skippable/animate Vincent false true 500 18 19/specificTemporarySprite beachStuff/viewport 42 19 true/move farmer 0 9 1/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "嗨， @。天氣不錯吧？"/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/speak Sam "我只是來看看我弟弟。這種天氣帶他出來玩玩挺不錯的。"/pause 1700/speak Sam "我們父親也常常在風和日麗時帶我們去沙灘玩。$h"/jump Vincent/stopAnimation Vincent/showFrame Vincent 0/pause 1000/move Vincent 0 -4 3/move Vincent -1 0 3/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection farmer 1/playMusic desolate/speak Vincent "山姆……？$u"/pause 900/speak Vincent "父親還會回來嗎？$s"/emote Sam 28/showFrame Sam 34/pause 800/speak Sam "那是當然的，文森特。父親一做好他的事就會儘快趕回來的。$7"/pause 600/speak Vincent "但是我聽到很多大人說……我們的部隊被打得落花流水。$s"/showFrame Sam 35/pause 1500/speak Sam "不要相信謠言。$8"/showFrame Sam 4/speak Sam "你忘了父親有多強大嗎？他才不會讓垃圾戈特洛士兵抓到！你別擔心！$a#$b#而且別忘了還有媽媽和我在這裡陪你玩。"/playMusic ocean/speak Vincent "好的！"/jump Vincent/pause 1000/move Vincent 1 0 2/showFrame Sam 4 true/faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Vincent 0 4 2/animate Vincent false true 500 18 19/playSound sandyStep/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Sam "老實說，我都不知道父親會不會回來……新聞都播報了。我們的士兵傷亡慘重。$s#$b#但我又怎麼能告訴文森特這些事呢？$7"/pause 1000/question null "#對小孩子坦白很重要。#你做得很對。不能讓小孩子失去希望。"/emote Sam 40/pause 1000/splitSpeak Sam "你也是這樣想的？$7#$b#或許你是對的……這是個殘酷的世界，但是孩子們總得知道這個真相。$s~對……孩子們應該把握這個機會擁有一個快樂的童年。"/pause 700/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Sam "對了，我有告訴你樂隊開始打出名堂了嗎？#$b#對！阿比蓋爾是個很棒的鼓手。而塞巴斯蒂安非常重視她……$h"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.739330/t 600 1710/*n spring_2_1: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 28 35 1 Willy 44 35 1/removeQuest 13/addMailReceived NOQUEST_13/skippable/animate Willy false true 250 28 29 30 31/viewport 44 35 true/move farmer 7 0 1/playSound seagulls/move farmer 7 0 1/pause 500/playSound seagulls/pause 1000/playSound seagulls/speak Willy "喂，孩子。$u^喂，姑娘。$u#$b#聽說鎮子上搬來了一位新來的……終於見到你了。$u"/pause 500/playSound seagulls/pause 1000/stopAnimation Willy/playSound dwop/faceDirection Willy 2 true/pause 50/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speak Willy "啊…………我還在放鬆自己，之前出海了整整一個月……$h#$b#那次真是場大豐收啊！我賣了很多魚。#$b#終於存夠錢購買一支新的魚竿。$h"/move Willy -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Willy "給，這條舊魚竿就送給你好了。$h#$b#最重要的是讓釣魚的傳統流傳下去。也許培養起你的興趣後，你會光顧我的商店也說不定。$h"/pause 1000/playSound seagulls/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead rod/pause 3300/awardFestivalPrize rod/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/playSound seagulls/move Willy 0 1 2/pause 1000/showFrame Willy 24/pause 1000/speak Willy "這裡的水不錯。有著各式各樣的魚。"/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "啊對了。我的店子恢復營業了，有需要的話隨時來找我。$h#$b#你捕到什麼也可以賣給我。#$b#“能吃的，就能賣”。呵呵。反正我老爸經常這麼說的。$h"/pause 500/playSound seagulls/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 1000/pause 500/animate Willy false true 250 28 29 30 31/viewport move 1 0 5500/pause 1500/playSound seagulls/pause 1500/playSound seagulls/pause 2000/end position 42 36
content.711130/t 600 1710/f Willy 1500: ocean/30 34/farmer 27 35 1 Willy 30 34 2 Gus -10 -10 0/skippable/addConversationTopic willyCrabs/showFrame Willy 24/move farmer 3 0 0/showFrame Willy 0/pause 800/speak Willy "啊...太好了，你出現了，小伙子。^啊...啊...太好了，你出現了，小姐。#$b#我遇到...遇到一點麻煩，可能需要幫忙..."/faceDirection Willy 3/faceDirection Willy 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Willy 2/speak Willy "呃……還是直接讓你看一下比較好……"/pause 600/faceDirection Willy 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Willy 0/speak Willy "現在深呼吸一次。"/pause 300/playSound doorClose/warp Willy -100 -100/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer -100 -100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation FishShop/specificTemporarySprite willyCrabExperiment/warp Willy 5 7/faceDirection Willy 0/playMusic ragtime/pause 500/viewport 5 7 true/pause 5000/warp farmer 5 9/playSound doorClose/pause 100/jump farmer/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Willy 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Willy 2/speak Willy "正如你能看到...#$b#能聞到...呃...#$b#這是老姑娘們昨晚的“狂歡”……呵……$h#$b#我的實驗需要一些投入..."/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 2 0 1/emote farmer 56/warp Gus 5 9/playSound doorClose/pause 100/jump Gus/pause 1000/speak Gus "Hooo~...又在做實驗，威利？$h"/textAboveHead Willy "對..."/move Gus 0 -1 3/move Gus -2 0 3/pause 1000/speak Gus "它看起來很新鮮..."/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "對...這些是你從未見過的最美味、最肥美的螃蟹。$h#$b#但是，他們有點過於活躍了...$s"/pause 1000/emote Gus 40/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 1000/speak Gus "我全要！$h#$b#當然，額外的人工要打點折..."/pause 2000/move farmer 1 0 0 true/move Gus -1 0 0 false/move farmer 0 -1 0 true/move Gus 0 -1 0 false/faceDirection Willy 0/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 3/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 1/pause 1000/playSound fishSlap/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 2/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/speak Gus "似乎全歸我們了..."/pause 1000/speak Willy "再見，甜心美人們...$s"/pause 1000/speak Gus "噓...@...不要告訴威利，但我會在接下來的幾天裡在酒吧中做點特別的蟹肉餅..."/pause 1000/end position 30 34
content.7771191/t 2000 2500/f Krobus 3500/w sunn: moonlightJellies/-1000 -1000/farmer 0 0 2 Krobus 84 40 2/showFrame Krobus 17/addTemporaryActor SeaMonsterKrobus 32 32 -1 -1 0 false/addLantern 735 83 40 1/positionOffset Krobus 0 52/viewport 84 40 clamp true/pause 3300/animate Krobus false true 500 17 18 17 19/specificTemporarySprite krobusBeach/pause 8000/stopAnimation Krobus/showFrame Krobus 17/pause 2000/emote Krobus 20/pause 4000/faceDirection SeaMonsterKrobus 0/playSound pullItemFromWater/animate SeaMonsterKrobus false false 100 20 21 22 23/warp SeaMonsterKrobus 84 45/pause 600/showFrame Krobus 0/jump Krobus/pause 100/animate SeaMonsterKrobus false true 250 8 9 10 11/pause 800/pause 1500/stopAnimation SeaMonsterKrobus/move SeaMonsterKrobus 0 -3 0/pause 1000/emote Krobus 8/pause 2000/animate SeaMonsterKrobus false false 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19/playSound waterSlosh/pause 400/showFrame SeaMonsterKrobus 19/pause 500/playSound coin/warp Krobus -1 -1/faceDirection SeaMonsterKrobus 2 true/animate SeaMonsterKrobus false true 500 0 1/pause 2000/stopAnimation SeaMonsterKrobus/playSound waterSlosh/move SeaMonsterKrobus 0 3 2/animate SeaMonsterKrobus false true 500 2 3/pause 3000/stopAnimation SeaMonsterKrobus/playSound waterSlosh/move SeaMonsterKrobus 3 0 1/playSound waterSlosh/move SeaMonsterKrobus -6 0 3/emote SeaMonsterKrobus 20 true/playSound waterSlosh/move SeaMonsterKrobus 6 0 1/playSound waterSlosh/move SeaMonsterKrobus -9 0 3 true/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/end
content.3131209/n willyBugWadCutscene: ocean/-2000 -2000/farmer 49 22 2/addTemporaryActor Willy 16 64 52 26 2/addCraftingRecipe Quality Bobber/skippable/specificTemporarySprite WillyWad/animate Willy false true 500 8 9 10 11/pause 1000/speak Willy "嘿嘿……它們很喜歡……看它們動來動去！$h"/pause 1000/playSound slosh/pause 500/playSound slosh/pause 500/playSound slosh/pause 500/viewport 52 24 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 2 2/textAboveHead Willy "啊嘿！"/pause 2000/speak Willy "我正想到你，小伙子。^我正想到你，小姑娘。#$b#你找到的蟲肉真是完美！#$b#哈哈……我說“新鮮”，不是想要還在蠕動的！#$b#啊，我沒在抱怨！魚兒很喜歡……哈哈哈……$h"/emote farmer 28 true/pause 300/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/speak Willy "作為感謝，我想教給你一個老漁夫的秘密……我老爹好多年前帶我出去釣魚的時候教我的。"/pause 500/playSound reward/message "已學會製作“優質浮標”"/pause 500/speak Willy "用那個浮標可以吸引來高品質的魚。#$b#然後口袋裡就會有更多的錢，小伙子。哈哈……$h^然後口袋裡就會有更多的錢，小姑娘。哈哈……$h"/pause 1500/pause 300/playSound fishBite/pause 500/pause 400/playSound FishHit/animate Willy false true 100 17 18/textAboveHead Willy "釣到了！"/shake Willy 5000/pause 200/playSound slosh/pause 200/playSound slosh/pause 220/playSound slosh/pause 160/playSound slosh/pause 200/playSound slosh/pause 220/playSound slosh/pause 160/playSound slosh/pause 200/playSound slosh/pause 220/playSound slosh/pause 160/playSound slosh/pause 200/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
